level.heading: Exclusions.
level.text: The provisions of this subchapter shall not apply to:
Any group health benefit plan for any plan year if, on the first day of such plan year, such plan has less than 2 participants who are current employees; or
Any health benefit plan for any of the excepted benefits.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-3301.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-209, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-3301.01.
